crawling module¶

crawling.clothes(clothesReviews)[소스]¶

summarise the clothes information to using Review Database

매개 변수:clothesReview -- dictionary to saving the review data
반환:return the dictionary to company data
반환 형식:dictionary
crawling.crawling_cloth(clothes)[소스]¶

find the data for clothes review and return the dictionary

매개 변수:clothes -- the list of clothes that wanted information to review

:type clothes : a list of strings :return: dictionary of returned :rtype: dictionary

crawling.main()[소스]¶
crawling.sites(clothesReviews)[소스]¶

count the site information to using Review database

매개 변수:clothesReviews (dictionary) -- dictionary to saving the review data
반환:return the dictionary to company data
반환 형식:dictionary
